categories.name: Housing
categories.description: Anything required to live in your home.
categories.examples: rent/mortgage, HOA, property tax, home insurance, repairs/maintenance, furniture (if home-related)

categories.name: Utilities & Connectivity
categories.description: Bills that keep the home running and you connected.
categories.examples: electricity, gas, water, trash, internet, mobile plan

categories.name: Groceries
categories.description: General merchandise and groceries for home consumption.
categories.examples: supermarket groceries, wholesale club purchases, household supplies, general merchandise

categories.name: Food & Restaurants
categories.description: Eating and drinking outside the home.
categories.examples: restaurants, cafes, takeout, food delivery, coffee shops, bars, snacks while out

categories.name: Transportation
categories.description: Costs to move around, especially vehicle + commuting.
categories.examples: gas/EV charging, public transit, tolls, parking, car maintenance, registration, rideshares

categories.name: Health & Wellness
categories.examples: health insurance premiums, doctor visits, medicines, lab tests, dental/vision, therapy

categories.name: Personal Care & Fitness
categories.examples: gym membership, sports/classes, haircut, skincare, grooming

categories.name: Shopping
categories.description: Lifestyle-related shopping for wants and personal purchases.
categories.examples: clothing, accessories, electronics, hobbies, Amazon/retail non-grocery, beauty products

categories.name: Subscriptions
categories.description: Recurring digital services and subscription memberships.
categories.examples: streaming services (Netflix, Hulu, Disney+), apps, software, music, gaming subscriptions, memberships

categories.name: Travel & Occasions
categories.examples: flights, hotels, vacation spend, out-of-town trips, weddings, special celebrations

categories.name: Financial & Future
categories.description: Money management: obligations + building the future.
categories.examples: debt payments, taxes, interest/fees, savings, investments, gifts/donations

categories.name: Other
categories.description: Expenses that don't fit into any of the above categories.
